ai-ds2.1.5:1.2_0: At a time when he develops the supermundane absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.5:1.2_1: there is the first absorption, there is the way of entering and remain in the perception of contact. At that time the mind is full of rapture, there is calm, activity, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-ds2.1.5:1.3_0: At that time, these and other things are not dependently originated,
ai-ds2.1.5:2.1_0: at that time what is contact?
ai-ds2.1.5:2.2_0: At that time the contact, touching of contact,
ai-ds2.1.5:2.3_0: at that time there is contact,
ai-ds2.1.5:3.1_0: at that time what is feeling?
ai-ds2.1.5:3.2_0: At that time, with the mind-consciousness element, mental pleasure, and the enjoyable feeling born of mind contact.
ai-ds2.1.5:3.3_0: at that time there is feeling.
ai-ds2.1.5:4.2_0: At that time the corresponding consciousness is perceivedness of perception, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ds2.1.5:4.3_0: and at that time there is perception.
ai-ds2.1.5:5.1_0: at that time what is intention?
ai-ds2.1.5:5.2_0: At that time the mortification in disgust of sin is related to mentality-consciousness element.
ai-ds2.1.5:5.3_0: At that time there is intention,
ai-ds2.1.5:6.2_0: Whatever mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind contact are given up.
ai-ds2.1.5:6.3_0: At that time this is their mind.
ai-ds2.1.5:7.1_0: at that time what is thinking?
ai-ds2.1.5:7.2_0: At that time the thought and the thought are got the same repulsion of the mind, and it is the right way.
ai-ds2.1.5:7.3_0: At that time this thought arose,
ai-ds2.1.5:8.1_0: At that time what is reference to the monastery?
ai-ds2.1.5:8.2_0: At that time is reading the four preoccupations of verbal decision, without mental preoccupations or mind.
ai-ds2.1.5:8.3_0: At that time this is the proper conduct.
ai-ds2.1.5:9.2_0: At that time the joy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity are uplifted and overjoyed.
ai-ds2.1.5:9.3_0: At that time this is joyful.
ai-ds2.1.5:10.2_0: At that time with your mind happy pleasant feeling, painful, or neutral feeling that’s born of mental pleasure.
ai-ds2.1.5:10.3_0: At that time this is happiness.
ai-ds2.1.5:11.2_0: At that time their mind is steadiness, not undeveloped. It is the awakening factor of immersion; it is the awakening factor of not being discontent; the awakening factor of immersion; and the path is the practice that leads to immersion.
ai-ds2.1.5:11.3_0: At that time there is one-pointedness of mind.
ai-ds2.1.5:12.1_0: What is the faculty of faith?
ai-ds2.1.5:12.2_0: At that time the faith faculty of faith is the power of faith,
ai-ds2.1.5:12.3_0: This is the faculty of faith.
ai-ds2.1.5:13.1_0: What is the faculty of energy?
ai-ds2.1.5:13.2_0: At that time, when energy is roused up and unflagging, the faculty of energy is sharp and severe,
ai-ds2.1.5:13.3_0: This is the faculty of energy.
ai-ds2.1.5:14.1_0: What is the faculty of mindfulness?
ai-ds2.1.5:14.2_0: At that time is mindfulness of the body, recollection of death, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-ds2.1.5:14.3_0: This is the faculty of mindfulness.
ai-ds2.1.5:15.2_0: At that time their mind is steadiness, not undeveloped. It is the awakening factor of immersion; it is the awakening factor of not being discontent; the awakening factor of immersion; and the path is the practice that leads to immersion.
ai-ds2.1.5:15.3_0: This is the faculty of immersion.
ai-ds2.1.5:16.1_0: which is the faculty of wisdom?
ai-ds2.1.5:16.2_0: At that time wisdom is the language of wisdom, clarity, conduct, wisdom, freedom, and the enlightenmentation of the Dhamma. At that time wisdom is the enlightenment of the life faculty.
ai-ds2.1.5:16.3_0: This is the faculty of wisdom.
ai-ds2.1.5:17.1_0: What is the faculty of mind?
ai-ds2.1.5:17.2_0: Whatever mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind contact are given up.
ai-ds2.1.5:17.3_0: At that time there is the faculty of mind.
ai-ds2.1.5:18.1_0: What is the faculty of happiness?
ai-ds2.1.5:18.2_0: At that time with your mind happy pleasant feeling, painful, or neutral feeling that’s born of mental pleasure.
ai-ds2.1.5:18.3_0: This is the faculty of happiness.
ai-ds2.1.5:19.1_0: What is the faculty of life?
ai-ds2.1.5:19.3_0: This is the faculty of life.
ai-ds2.1.5:20.1_0: At that time what is the faculty of wisdom?
ai-ds2.1.5:20.2_0: For the wisdom there is from giving up the things that are not incapable of understanding. It’s the untrue laziness and states of the enlightenment of wisdom. It’s the fullness of wisdom. It has the understanding that is the basis for ending the defilements.
ai-ds2.1.5:20.3_0: At that time the faculty of wisdom is the faculty of understanding,
ai-ds2.1.5:21.2_0: At that time wisdom is the language of wisdom, clarity, conduct, wisdom, freedom, and the enlightenmentation of the Dhamma. At that time wisdom is the enlightenment of the life faculty.
ai-ds2.1.5:21.3_0: At that time there is right view.
ai-ds2.1.5:22.2_0: At that time the thought and the thought are got the same repulsion of the mind, and it is the right way.
ai-ds2.1.5:22.3_0: At that time there is right thought.
ai-ds2.1.5:23.2_0: At that time when bad conduct is bad for the four kinds of misconduct ...
ai-ds2.1.5:23.3_0: At that time there is right speech, there is right speech,
ai-ds2.1.5:24.2_0: At that time he is far from bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, without ill will, he acts disrespectfully and irreversible.
ai-ds2.1.5:24.3_0: At that time this is right action.
ai-ds2.1.5:25.2_0: At that time they make a living response, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
ai-ds2.1.5:25.3_0: At that time there is right livelihood.
ai-ds2.1.5:26.2_0: At that time, when energy is roused up and unflagging, the faculty of energy is sharp and severe,
ai-ds2.1.5:26.3_0: At that time there is right endeavour.
ai-ds2.1.5:27.2_0: At that time is mindfulness of the body, recollection of death, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.

ai-ds2.1.5:29.2_0: At that time the faith faculty of faith is the power of faith,
ai-ds2.1.5:29.3_0: This is the power of faith.

ai-ds2.1.5:30.2_0: At that time, when energy is roused up and unflagging, the faculty of energy is sharp and severe,
ai-ds2.1.5:30.3_0: At that time the power of energy is strength.
ai-ds2.1.5:31.1_0: which is the power of mindfulness?
ai-ds2.1.5:31.2_0: At that time is mindfulness of the body, recollection of death, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-ds2.1.5:31.3_0: This is the power of mindfulness.
ai-ds2.1.5:32.1_0: At that time what is the power of immersion?
ai-ds2.1.5:32.2_0: At that time their mind is steadiness, not undeveloped. It is the awakening factor of immersion; it is the awakening factor of not being discontent; the awakening factor of immersion; and the path is the practice that leads to immersion.
ai-ds2.1.5:32.3_0: At that time there is the strength of concentration.
ai-ds2.1.5:33.1_0: at that time what is the power of wisdom?
ai-ds2.1.5:33.2_0: At that time wisdom is the language of wisdom, clarity, conduct, wisdom, freedom, and the enlightenmentation of the Dhamma. At that time wisdom is the enlightenment of the life faculty.
ai-ds2.1.5:33.3_0: At that time there is the power of wisdom.
ai-ds2.1.5:34.1_0: At that time what is the power of conscience?
ai-ds2.1.5:34.2_0: When there’s a time when it’s shameless with bad and unwholesome thoughts,
ai-ds2.1.5:34.3_0: At that time there is the strength of conscience.
ai-ds2.1.5:35.1_0: which is the power of prudence?
ai-ds2.1.5:35.2_0: When he’s prudent and prudent when it comes to acquiring any bad, unskillful qualities—
ai-ds2.1.5:35.3_0: At that time there is the strength of conscience.
ai-ds2.1.5:36.2_0: At that time you’re not greedy, hateful, and delusion.
ai-ds2.1.5:36.3_0: At that time there is no greed.
ai-ds2.1.5:37.1_0: At that time what is non-doing?
ai-ds2.1.5:37.2_0: At that time without ill will, too, is a root of good will, and good will.
ai-ds2.1.5:37.3_0: At that time there is no hate.
ai-ds2.1.5:38.2_0: At that time wisdom is the language of wisdom, clarity, conduct, wisdom, freedom, and the enlightenmentation of the Dhamma. At that time wisdom is the enlightenment of the life faculty.
ai-ds2.1.5:38.3_0: At that time there is no delusion;
ai-ds2.1.5:39.2_0: At that time you’re not greedy, hateful, and delusion.
ai-ds2.1.5:39.3_0: At that time it is content.

ai-ds2.1.5:40.2_0: At that time without ill will, too, is a root of good will, and good will.

ai-ds2.1.5:44.2_0: At that time the aggregates of feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are tranquilized. When tranquility is tranquilized by tranquility and tranquility.

ai-ds2.1.5:46.3_0: At that time there is bodily lightness.

ai-ds2.1.5:47.2_0: At that time the entire mass of consciousness is unconcerned, undeferential, and unconcerned.
ai-ds2.1.5:47.3_0: At that time there is a blazing mind.

ai-ds2.1.5:48.2_0: At that time the aggregates of feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness is unshakable:

ai-ds2.1.5:49.2_0: At that time the entire spectrum of consciousness is unmovable, undeferential, and unconditioned.
ai-ds2.1.5:49.3_0: At that time there is a mind-made body.

ai-ds2.1.5:50.2_0: At that time the aggregates of feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.

ai-ds2.1.5:51.2_0: At that time the entire spectrum of consciousness is produced by deeds,
ai-ds2.1.5:51.3_0: At that time there is agitation through the mind.

ai-ds2.1.5:52.2_0: At that time the aggregates of feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.

ai-ds2.1.5:54.2_0: At that time the aggregates of feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are straightened:

ai-ds2.1.5:55.2_0: At that time there was a straight pentading that had been straightened of consciousness,

ai-ds2.1.5:63.2_0: intentions of contact, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity. The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom. Their mind is the power of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom. Right mindfulness is the power of the body. Right immersion I will give rise to right knowledge and vision. Right knowledge of the body, right view, right knowledge, and right freedom.

ai-ds2.1.5:90.1_0: What is the faculty of wisdom?
ai-ds2.1.5:90.2_0: the wisdom there is from these things that are seen, heard, thought, known, attained, sought, and explored by the mind. At that time they sense restraint, wisdom, the laziness, the wisdom, the overflowing of the teachings, the wisdom faculty, and the wisdom of wisdom.
ai-ds2.1.5:90.3_0: At that time, these and other things are not dependently originated,
ai-ds2.1.5:90.5_0: The fourth path is the fourth path.
